actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for the counting of certain World War II military service toward the years of service requirements for eligibility for certain benefits under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to include military service performed between December 1, 1941, and December 31, 1946, ad "years of service" for purposes of eligibility for benefits under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to provide for the counting of certain World War II military service toward the years of service requirements for eligibility for certain benefits under such Act.
